title: CBC NEWS話中國科學家夫婦偷病毒係FAKE NEWS

replies.msg: Online claims that Chinese scientists stole coronavirus from Winnipeg lab have 'no factual basis'

https://www.google.com.hk/amp/s/www.cbc.ca/amp/1.5442376

手殘未打完就開咗post

Contrary to posts on Twitter, the coronavirus was not part of this shipment. And there is no confirmation Qiu or Cheng were the scientists behind the shipment.

其實我睇到twitter個post嗰陣
我都搵唔到有相關文件直接prove佢地係個shipment嘅負責人
大家睇路

https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/manitoba/chinese-researcher-escorted-from-infectious-disease-lab-amid-rcmp-investigation-1.5211567

呢個係CBC之前publish嘅報導
關於中國夫婦同佢啲學生離開lab嘅原因係policy breach
相信twitter嗰篇嘢係純粹一個speculation
Rather than fact
我明白係有啲可疑嘅成份
但policy breach真係唔代表啲咩陰謀
利申 呢個係純粹一個fact check post

quote.msg: 利申 呢個係純粹一個fact check post

replies.msg:
所以咪冇人推
冇證據嘅陰謀論先推到幾十頁
為保支那/加拿大外交關系，及避免尷尬，加拿大公開否認好正常。

如果加拿大承認有支那人偷野，高官就要問責下台，亦會觸發加拿大排華情緒
